Texts.Chs: 干得好，还差一步就能修好你的^green;传送器^reset;：一个^orange;电磁铁^reset;。如果你不介意，就在你的^green;加工台^reset;为我制作一个吧？
Texts.Eng: Good job. There's one more step to getting your ^green;Teleporter^reset; fixed: An ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;. Build one at your ^green;Machining Table^reset; for me, if you don't mind?

Texts.Chs: 棒极了！接下来，你需要在你的^green;加工台^reset;制造一些^orange;铜线^reset;。有了它我就能对你的^green;传送器^reset;进行应急修理。它的缓冲器被注册为降级的，而这不是最佳状态。
Texts.Eng: Great work! Next, you are going to need to make ^orange;Wire^reset; at the ^green;Machining Table^reset;. With that I'll be able to jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset;. It's buffer is registering as degraded, which is not optimal.

Texts.Chs: 你好，陌生人。我探测到了你的^orange;大地守护团^reset;标志进入了系统并且立刻展开了研究。你的飞船^red;与这里的恒星发生了一次碰撞^reset;，所以我继续研究并重定向了你的导航系统。
Texts.Eng: Greetings, stranger! I detected your ^orange;Protectorate Energy Signature^reset; entering the system and investigated immediately. You were on a ^red;collision course with the sun^reset;, so I went ahead and redirected your nav system.

Texts.Chs: 我现在可以帮你修复你的飞船^green;传送器^reset;。它应该不再有17.3%的几率会干扰你的DNA！现在你需要找到一个足够强大的能量源来组装一个新的^orange;STL引擎^reset;，以使你的飞船能够再次触及太空旅行。
Texts.Eng: I can now fix up your ship's ^green;Teleporter^reset;. It should no longer have a 17.3% chance of scrambling your DNA! Now you'll need to find an energy source sufficient to assemble a new ^orange;STL Drive^reset; to get your ship space-worthy.

Texts.Chs: 我建议你尽快熟悉^orange;研究菜单^reset;，因为如果你想让你的飞船重新触及星空，这是唯一可行的手段。为什么不研究一下^orange;农业学^reset;来迈出第一步呢？
Texts.Eng: I suggest familiarizing yourself with the ^orange;Research Menu^reset; as soon as possible, since that is going to be your sole means of progress if you wish to ever get this ship space-worthy again. Why not ^green;Research^reset; a little into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; to get you started?

Texts.Chs: 在你的^orange;个人三度仪^reset;中，^orange;研究^reset;菜单将会是最重要的部分，为你提供一切制作蓝图的解锁。通过点击^green;[鼠标左键]^reset;菜单中的^green;绿色烧杯^reset;图标打开^orange;研究^reset;菜单。
Texts.Eng: In your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; the ^orange;Research^reset; menu will be the most important part, providing you with access to Blueprint unlocks for -all- crafting. Access the ^orange;Research^reset; menu via the ^green;Green Beaker^reset; icon within the ^green; [ Mouse 1 ]^reset; menu.

Texts.Chs: 按^green;[Shift + 鼠标左键]^reset;打开^orange;工具配置^reset;对话框。在这里，你可以调整你的物质枪。如果你愿意的话，你也可以替换主要动作栏为不同的工具或武器。只需拖拽即可！
Texts.Eng: Press ^green;[Shift + Mouse 1]^reset; for the ^orange;Tool Configuration^reset; dialog. Here, you can adjust your Matter Manipulator, or even place different tools or weapons into your Primary slots if you desire. Just drag and drop!

Texts.Chs: 看起来我的出现很是及时，你的^orange;FTL引擎^reset;已经^red;毁坏^reset;了，而你的推动引擎基本上也彻底失效了。^green;我想我们可以互相帮助^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Seems I was just in time, too. Your ^orange;FTL drive^reset; is ^red;broken^reset; and your impulse drive is basically dead in the water. ^green;I think maybe we can help each other^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 全宇宙一流的科学流派经常会参观这里，在这里，你能学到很多东西。快点在你的SAIL上找到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的位置吧！
Texts.Eng: Some of the finest scientific minds in the universe visit there often, and there is a great deal you could learn. Find the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; on your SAIL!

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你为我所做的调查！你的帮助让我^green;非常感激^reset;作为回报，拿上这些^orange;用于你的SAIL的坐标^reset;吧。我重新使之运作了，我认为这会对你非常有用。
Texts.Eng: Thanks for investigating that for me! Your help is ^green;deeply appreciated^reset;! As a thanks...take these ^orange;coordinates for your SAIL^reset;. I run the facility there and I think you'll find it quite useful.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;个人三度仪^reset;^red;非常重要^reset;，不要弄丢了，永远都不！不过……如果你弄丢了，你仍然可以在你的^orange;改造台^reset;中重新制作一个新的。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; is ^red;EXTREMELY^reset; important. Do not throw it out. Ever! Should you lose it, you can always create a new ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; in your ^green;Tinker Table^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;个人三度仪^reset;对于你的生存至关重要。主要的^green;[鼠标左键]^reset;功能允许你访问^orange;研究^reset;，^orange;机甲配置^reset;，^orange;科技升级^reset;等页面。你已经在你的^cyan;[I]背包^reset;中得到了一个。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; is absolutely essential to your survival. The primary ^green;[Mouse 1]^reset; function provides access to ^orange;Research^reset;, ^orange;Mech Configuration^reset;, ^orange;Tech Upgrades^reset; and more. You've got one in your ^cyan;[I]nventory^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 这个星球的地表上有一处我进不去的^orange;黑暗洞穴^reset;，我先前曾检测到来自这里面的^orange;奇怪的读数^reset;，它们足够强大，其源头或许能够提供^green;让你离开这个世界的能量源^reset;。
Texts.Eng: There's this ^orange;Dark Cavern^reset; on the surface I can't fit inside. I've previously detected ^orange;strange readings^reset; coming from within They're strong enough that the source ^green;may provide the energy source you need^reset; to get off-world.

Texts.Chs: 要想离开这个星球，你需要^green;修理你的飞船^reset;。首先，你需要在你的^green;[C]制作菜单^reset;中制作一个^orange;加工台^reset;。你同样需要研究^orange;工程学^reset;。
Texts.Eng: To get off this planet, you're going to need to ^green;repair your ship^reset;. To do that you'll need to make a ^orange;Machining Table^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting menu^reset;. You'll need to ^orange;Research Engineering^reset; to do so.

Texts.Chs: 选择^orange;个人三度仪^reset;之后，按^green;[鼠标右键]^reset;打开^orange;任务管理器^reset;，这里你可以进入FU的相关任务，完成它们可以得到有用的回报和独特的战利品。
Texts.Eng: With the ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; selected, press ^green;[Mouse 2]^reset; for the ^orange;Task Manager^reset;, where you can access your FU related Quests. Completing these will result in useful rewards and unique loot.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;三度仪^reset;，我们就不能扫描用于你的飞船的^orange;能量源^reset;。你是否已经有了一个？如果没有，快去^orange;做一个^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we can't scan for a ^orange;power source^reset; for your ship beyond here. You've still got one right? If not, you'll have to ^ornge;create one^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;三度仪^reset;，我们就不能进行下一步工作。为了使能源生效，它需要和这个设备进行正确的交互。
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we won't be able to proceed. It needs to interface with this machine to properly enable the power.
